articles.description: Follow text updates of Rosenborg v Hearts before live TV and online coverage of Hibernian v Luzern in Europa Conference League qualifying.
articles.title: Europa Conference League qualifying: Hearts face Rosenborg in Norway

articles.description: Stevie Eskinazi hits a classy 43 from 18 balls as Welsh Fire claim a comfortable six-wicket win over Birmingham Phoenix in The Hundred.
articles.title: Fire cruise to victory over winless Phoenix

articles.description: Tottenham striker Harry Kane must make "the biggest decision of his career" as he ponders a possible move to Bayern Munich.
articles.title: Kane faces his biggest decision as Spurs exit looms

articles.description: England forward Lauren James is given a two-match ban by Fifa for her red card in the Women's World Cup game with Nigeria.
articles.title: England's James has ban extended to two games

articles.description: The best of the action from the opening day at Walton Heath.
articles.title: Golf: Women's Open - 2023: Day 1

articles.description: Lawrence Shankland's late consolation gives Hearts hope of prolonging their Europa Conference League campaign after a scratchy performance against Rosenborg in Norway.
articles.title: Shankland goal gives Hearts hope in Rosenborg loss

articles.description: Watch Welsh Fire's Roelof Van der Merwe's take a stunning catch to dismiss Birmingham Phoenix's Moeen Ali for 17 in The Hundred 2023 at Edgbaston.
articles.title: What a recovery! Van der Merwe's juggles but holds catch

articles.description: Australian Nick Kyrgios withdraws from the US Open as his injury problems continue.
articles.title: Kyrgios withdraws from US Open with injury

articles.description: Shabnim Ismail takes a hat-trick with the last three balls of the game to maintain Welsh Fire's unbeaten run in The Hundred women's competition.
articles.title: Ismail hat-trick seals tense Fire win over Phoenix

articles.description: Great Britain's Sarah Storey wins her 36th Para-cycling gold at the World Championships in Glasgow.
articles.title: Britain's Storey wins 36th world Para-cycling gold
